p: Benzoic acid (2.58%, 22.51%), ( E)-Cinnamaldehyde (34.6%, 5.58%), Trans-cinnamic acid (16.86%, 4.51%), O-Methoxy-cinnamaldehyde (2.04%, 2.14%), Cinamyl alcohol (21.3%, 42.48%), and 4-Allyl-2,6-dimethoxyphenol (3.24%, 8.79%) were the major compounds present in SG and SW decoction water extracts. Benzoic acid and Cinnamyl alcohol were not detected in CC, PWE and DWE. 4-Allyl-2,6-dimethoxyphenol (1.79%, 1.05%) was seen as a minor constituent in CC extracted using pressured water and as a decoction ( Table 3).
